body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, 180° Rotating Broom Combo, Foldable Floor Sweeping Set with Long Handle, Stand Dustpan and Broom Combo with Comb Teeth for Office Kitchen Lobby Floor Cleaning (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
features: 🎈【High-quality Material】This floor broom squeegee dustpan set is efficient to clean the floor. The handle is made of premium stainless steel material; broom head and dustpan made of PP and PET material; the squeegee is made of soft silicone material. Soft bristle broom and squeegee will not leave scratches to the floor. Durable and portable for daily cleaning.

🎈【Suitable Size】The broom head size is 27×11.5cm with a total height of 93.5cm; The dustpan head size is 24.5×25 ×7.5cm with a total height of 84.5cm; the floor squeegee head size is 38 × 4cm with a total height of 106cm. Suitable size enables easy to clean dust and litter. And the proper height meets daily cleaning height needs, it is convenient to use reducing back or joint pain.

🎈【180°Rotating Head Design】The head of broom, dustpan and squeegee features a 180°rotating connector joint making it flexible clean floor, bottom of the sofa, bed bottoms, etc. And the elastic bristles will effectively catch fine dust particles, pet hair and more. The dustpan head is rotatable for easily vertical storage. And the squeegee can be used for easier remove stagnant water and kitchen grease.

🎈【Comb Teeth Design】This dustpan is equipped with comb teeth that provide a convenience for removing pet hair, long hair, etc. Push the broom through the teeth, the hair and pet hair will fall into the dustpan. No need to remove entangled hair and dust of the broom bristle by hands. Practical and free your hands completely.

🎈【Foldable and Upright Design】This dustpan can be easily to fold 90°and stand upright prevents rubbish from falling out while moving rubbish. And it easy to storage without takes up much space. Also, the dustpan handle features a clip for the broom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Description: The floor broom squeegee dustpan set with comb teeth design which is foldable and 180 °rotating that is efficient to sweep the floor. Practical for daily use. Key Feature: Scratch Free: The broom bristle features soft bristle that is soft and flexible to clean the floor. And the squeegee is silicone material. Perfect for cleaning to the floor without scratches to the floor surface. Lightweight and Portable: The long-handled floor broom squeegee dustpan set is lightweight and portable which is effortless to use making cleaning easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This is a very small broom. Dust pan is nice but the way the parts are made it isn't very sturdy. The tubing is flimsy and the end caps don't stay on. Cheap, but not necessarily worth the buy. It's probably the same products on Temu.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't Buy This
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: My original review is below, but after using it for a little over a month, I am revising my review to one star. The polls are thin and cheap and screw into each other. After one month, every time I lift up the broom, the handle falls apart. It drives me nuts and I can't stand it. This is going in the trash.Original review:This is pretty good for the price. But I do wish the broom was larger - my old broom could sweep a room in less time since it was wider. This one is pretty narrow. Also the bristles are a bit to soft. Fine for lightweight crumbs, but for bigger things like a pebble, or for anything stuck on the floor a little, it becomes worthless.The dustpan is pretty good but should be a bit wider - the broom does not fit in it well as it's tad too wide, so it takes some maneuvering to fit it in while putting away. I should be able to drop it in. But for the price, these are all minor inconveniences, so I still gave it 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: It's good for picking up small messes and building it was easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheaply made and the one brooms silicone head is advertised in the description as being silicone and its not, its foam! Very disappointing and not worth 18.99.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this floor broom, dustpan, and squeegee set, and I'm impressed with its quality and design. The use of premium materials like stainless steel for the handle and soft silicone for the squeegee ensures durability without scratching the floor. The sizes are practical for effective cleaning, and the 180° rotating head design makes it versatile for various surfaces. The comb teeth on the dustpan help effortlessly remove pet hair. I appreciate the foldable and upright design, making storage a breeze.
